message:
SSHD-64: Logic error on the client side window for channels

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/mina/sshd/trunk@882494 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

added: if ((size < maxFree) && (maxFree - size > packetSize * 3 || size < maxFree / 2)) {
deleted: if ((maxFree - size) > packetSize && (maxFree - size > threshold || size < threshold)) {
